import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const Invoice = () => { const location = useLocation(); const booking = location.state || {}; const userEmail = localStorage.getItem('userEmail'); // Default QR code data if no booking exists const defaultQrData = 'https://sarkariibuss.com/Ba.2Kha9704'; const qrData = booking.invoiceNumber ? JSON.stringify({ billNo: booking.invoiceNumber, date: booking.date, email: userEmail, seats: booking.selectedSeats?.join(', '), from: `${booking.from}, ${booking.fromState}`, to: `${booking.to}, ${booking.toState}`, busName: booking.busName, busId: booking.busId, amount: booking.paymentDetails?.amount, passengers: booking.passengers?.map(p => p.name).join(', '), status: booking.status || 'confirmed' }) : defaultQrData; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'cancelled': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200'; default: return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200'; } }; return (
{/* Status Tag */}
{booking.status === 'cancelled' ? 'CANCELLED' : 'CONFIRMED'}
{/* Cancellation Stamp */} {booking.status === 'cancelled' && (
CANCELLED
)} {/* Print button */}
{/* Invoice content */}
{/* Header */}

SarkariiBUSS

Your Trusted Travel Partner

{/* Ticket Details */}

Bus Ticket

{booking.status === 'cancelled' ? 'CANCELLED' : 'CONFIRMED'}

From

{booking.from}

{booking.fromState}

To

{booking.to}

{booking.toState}

Date

{booking.date}

Bus Type

{booking.busType || 'Deluxe AC Sleeper'}

Bus Name

{booking.busName || 'Express Travels'}

Bus ID: {booking.busId}

Timings

Departure: {booking.departureTime}

Arrival: {booking.arrivalTime}

{booking.status === 'cancelled' && (

Cancellation Details

Cancelled on: {new Date(booking.cancellationDate).toLocaleString()}

Reason: {booking.cancellationReason}

)}
{/* Passenger Details */}

Passenger Details

{booking.passengers?.map((passenger, index) => ( ))}
Seat No. Name Age Gender
{passenger.seatNo} {passenger.name} {passenger.age} {passenger.gender}
{/* Booking Details */}

Booking Details

Bill No.: {booking.invoiceNumber}

Date: {booking.date}

Email: {userEmail}

From: {booking.from}, {booking.fromState}

To: {booking.to}, {booking.toState}

Bus Name: {booking.busName}

Bus ID: {booking.busId}

Dept. Time: {booking.departureTime}

Arrival Time: {booking.arrivalTime}

Total Passenger: {booking.passengers?.length || 0}

Base Amount: ₹{booking.paymentDetails?.amount}

Service Tax (5%): ₹{Math.round(booking.paymentDetails?.amount * 0.05)}

Total Amount: ₹{Math.round(booking.paymentDetails?.amount * 1.05)}

Payment Method: {booking.paymentDetails?.method?.toUpperCase() || 'Card'}

Status: {booking.status === 'cancelled' ? 'CANCELLED' : 'CONFIRMED'}

{booking.status === 'cancelled' && ( <>

Cancelled on: {new Date(booking.cancellationDate).toLocaleString()}

Reason: {booking.cancellationReason}

)}
{/* Footer */}

Important Notes:

  • Please arrive at least 30 minutes before departure time.
  • Carry a valid ID proof during the journey.
  • No refund on cancellation within 2 hours of departure.
  • For any assistance, call our 24/7 helpline: 1800-123-4567
); }; export default Invoice;
